query:
UPDATE cms_site_settings SET
                    setting_value = $2,
                    updated_at = datetime('now', 'subsec')
                WHERE id = $1
                RETURNING
                    id as "id!: Uuid",
                    site_id as "site_id!: Uuid",
                    setting_key,
                    setting_value,
                    created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                    updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
